  • Hand wash only; do not use in dishwasher

Perfect as a gift for yourself or the moody person in your life!

Crafted with care, this 1oz mug is ideal for both hot and cold beverages. Whether you're sipping on a hot cup of coffee, tea, or enjoying a refreshing cold drink, this mug has got you covered.

"I Just Want to Drink Hot Cocoa and Watch Christmas Movies" mug:

  • Capacity: 11 oz, perfect for your favourite cosy drinks.
  • Design: Printed on both sides with humour text..
  • Material: High-quality ceramic, durable for everyday use.
  • Dishwasher safe

This mug is a fun and quirky way to send a clear message to anyone thinking about touching your precious brew! Ideal as a gift or to enjoy yourself.

Please note that the photo displayed is a mock-up for visual reference.

This high-quality 11 oz mug features a vibrant design printed on both sides, ensuring it looks great from every angle. This durable mug will make a stylish and practical addition to your collection or a thoughtful gift for someone special.

Â

Product_Title: My Little Cup Of F**k Off Novelty Pink Handled Mug
Body_Html:
Crafted with care, this novelty mug is ideal for both hot and cold beverages. Whether you're sipping on a hot cup of coffee, tea, or enjoying a refreshing cold drink, this mug has got you covered.

Please note, to ensure the design lasts, this mug is not dishwasher-safe. For longevity, we recommend washing by hand only.

Key Features:

  • Capacity: 11oz
  • Suitable for hot or cold beverages
  • Pink Inner and Handle
  • Hand wash only; do not use in dishwasher

PLEASE ADD THE NAME IN THE BOX 'ORDER SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS' IN BASKET OR EMAIL/MESSAGE US :)Â 

Crafted with care, this 1oz mug is ideal for both hot and cold beverages. Whether you're sipping on a hot cup of coffee, tea, or enjoying a refreshing cold drink, this mug has got you covered.

Personalised Working Girl Mug:

  • Capacity: 11 oz, perfect for your favourite cosy drinks.
  • Design: Printed on both sides with Girl Boss text..
  • Material: High-quality ceramic, durable for everyday use.
  • Dishwasher safe

Tailor it to your style by selecting the hair colour that represents you or your gift recipient!

Please note that the photo displayed is a mock-up for visual reference.

This high-quality 11 oz mug features a vibrant design printed on both sides, ensuring it looks great from every angle. This durable mug will make a stylish and practical addition to your collection or a thoughtful gift for someone special.

This uplifting, fruity, and delicious Peach bath bomb crumble is the perfect way to bring a touch of joy to your bath time. Combining the sweet, mouth-watering notes of fresh peaches with all the fizz you love, this bath crumble will freshen up your bathing experience and leave you feeling revitalised. Simply scatter as much or as little as you like into your bathtub to create a nourishing and relaxing escape.
Features:
  • Sweet Peach Scent: Immerse yourself in the delightful aroma of juicy peaches. This bath bomb crumble captures the essence of ripe, sun-kissed peaches, infusing your bath with a scent thatâ€™s both uplifting and refreshing. The sweet and fruity fragrance lingers on your skin, ensuring you feel fresh and fragrant throughout the day.
  • Customisable Experience: Whether you prefer a gentle hint of fizz or a bath filled with bubbles, this bath crumble allows you to customise your experience. Sprinkle a small amount for a subtle, relaxing soak or pour in a generous handful for a more luxurious and indulgent bath. The choice is yours, making each bath as unique as you are.
  • Nourishing Aloe Vera Extracts: Enriched with the soothing and hydrating properties of Aloe Vera, this bath crumble not only adds fun to your bath but also cares for your skin. Aloe Vera is known for its gentle cleansing and moisturising benefits, helping to leave your skin feeling soft, smooth, and nourished. Itâ€™s perfect for maintaining healthy, hydrated skin, especially after a long day.
  • Fizz and Fun: Watch as the bath crumble fizzes and dissolves in your bathwater, releasing its enchanting fragrance and creating a playful, effervescent experience. The fizzing action adds an element of fun to your bath, turning an ordinary routine into a delightful and relaxing ritual.
How to Use:
  1. Fill your bathtub with warm water, making sure itâ€™s at a comfortable temperature.
  2. Take a handful of the Peach bath bomb crumble and sprinkle it into the water. You can add as much or as little as you like, depending on how strong you want the scent and fizz to be.
  3. As the crumble fizzes and dissolves, step into the bath and let the sweet peach fragrance envelop you. Relax and enjoy the soothing, nourishing experience.
  4. After soaking, rinse off and pat your skin dry, enjoying the lingering scent of peaches and the soft, smooth feel of your skin.
Why Youâ€™ll Love It:
This Peach bath bomb crumble is the perfect addition to any bath time routine, offering a delightful and uplifting way to unwind. Its sweet peach scent and fizzing action provide a fun and enjoyable experience, while the added Aloe Vera ensures your skin is left feeling soft and moisturised. Ideal for a relaxing soak after a long day or for turning a simple bath into a special treat, this bath crumble is sure to become a favourite. Indulge in the fruity freshness of peaches and give yourself the pampering you deserve with this delightful bath bomb crumble.

Product_Title: Tony Moly x Minions Peach Sugar Body Scrub
Body_Html:
Introducing the Tony Moly Minions Peach Sugar Body Scrub, a delightful and nourishing skincare treat that will leave your skin feeling soft, smooth, and radiantly refreshed. Packaged in a generous 300ml size, this body scrub combines the playful charm of Minions with the luxurious experience of a premium body treatment.

Product Features:

  • Gentle Exfoliation: This body scrub features fine sugar particles, which act as a gentle, non-drying exfoliant. These sugar granules effectively polish the skin, sloughing away dead skin cells and impurities to reveal soft, smooth, and revitalised skin beneath.

  • Nourishing Peach Extract and Peach Water: Infused with antioxidant-rich Peach Extract and Peach Water, this body scrub provides more than just exfoliation. The vitamin-rich peach ingredients help to brighten and condition the skin, leaving it feeling hydrated and soothed. The natural moisturising properties of peach also work to enhance the skinâ€™s elasticity and suppleness, making it feel soft and nourished.

  • Delicious Peach Scent: Indulge your senses with the mouth-watering aroma of fresh peaches. The deliciously sweet scent lingers on your skin, creating a refreshing and uplifting experience that makes your skincare routine feel like a treat.

  • Playful Minions Design: Featuring the beloved Minions on the packaging, this body scrub adds a touch of fun to your bathroom shelf. Itâ€™s perfect for fans of all ages who enjoy a bit of whimsy and joy in their daily routine.

  • Hydrating and Moisturising: Beyond exfoliation, the Peach Extract and Peach Water work together to hydrate and moisturise the skin. This dual-action helps to lock in moisture, ensuring that your skin feels soft, smooth, and deeply nourished after every use.

How to Use:

  1. Begin by applying a generous amount of the Tony Moly Minions Peach Sugar Body Scrub onto wet skin.

  2. Gently scrub your body in a massaging motion, focusing on areas where you need extra exfoliation, such as elbows, knees, and feet. The sugar granules will work to buff away dead skin cells, while the peach ingredients nourish and moisturise.

  3. Once youâ€™ve thoroughly massaged the scrub into your skin, rinse off with lukewarm water, washing away the sugar and impurities, and leaving behind soft, radiant skin.

  4. For best results, use the body scrub 2-3 times a week, or as needed, to maintain smooth and healthy-looking skin.

Why You'll Love It:

The Tony Moly Minions Peach Sugar Body Scrub is more than just a skincare product â€“ itâ€™s an indulgent experience that combines effective exfoliation with nourishing hydration. Perfect for all skin types, this scrub will leave your skin feeling pampered, soft, and smelling irresistibly like fresh peaches. Whether youâ€™re starting your day or winding down in the evening, this body scrub is the perfect way to add a little luxury and fun to your shower routine. Treat yourself to the delicious scent and softening effects of this playful and effective body scrub â€“ your skin will thank you!

Product_Title: White & Pink Smiley Memory Foam Slippers
Body_Html:
Designed to bring a touch of joy to your daily routine, these slippers combine cheerful aesthetics with exceptional comfort, making them a must-have addition to your loungewear collection.

Features:

  • Charming Design: These slippers feature a delightful design with a soft white base adorned with a playful pink smiley face, adding a cheerful and fun vibe to your mornings and evenings. The charming smiley faces are sure to bring a smile to your face, making every step you take a little bit brighter.

  • Memory Foam Comfort: Step into unparalleled comfort with the memory foam cushioned insoles that mould to the shape of your feet, providing customised support and cushioning with every step. The plush memory foam ensures that your feet are cradled in softness, reducing fatigue and making these slippers perfect for all-day wear around the house.

  • Closed Front Design: The closed front design offers full coverage, keeping your feet snug and warm, ideal for cooler days and nights. The secure fit also prevents slipping, providing stability and safety as you move about your home.

  • Slip-On Convenience: Designed for ease and convenience, these slippers are easy to slip on and off, making them perfect for quick trips around the house or for relaxing after a long day. No need to fuss with laces or straps â€“ simply slide your feet in and enjoy.

  • Durable Outsole: The sturdy yet flexible outsole ensures durability and grip, making these slippers suitable for light outdoor use, such as stepping out to the garden or fetching the post. The non-slip design provides added safety on a variety of surfaces, so you can move confidently from room to room.

  • Soft and Breathable Materials: Crafted from soft, breathable materials, these slippers keep your feet cosy without causing overheating. The plush lining feels luxurious against the skin, providing an extra layer of warmth and comfort.

Why You'll Love Them:

These smiley memory foam slippers are the perfect blend of style, comfort, and functionality. Whether youâ€™re enjoying a relaxing weekend at home, getting ready for bed, or unwinding after a busy day, these slippers are designed to provide the ultimate in comfort and cheer. Their charming design and exceptional comfort make them a delightful gift for yourself or a loved one.

Slip into a pair today and experience the perfect balance of softness, support, and a touch of whimsy â€“ because even your feet deserve to smile!

Product_Title: Kellogg's Fruit Loops Shower Gel 500ml
Body_Html:
Kickstart your day with a burst of fruity fun! Immerse yourself in the vibrant and energising essence of everyoneâ€™s favourite breakfast cereal, now captured in a refreshing shower gel that will elevate your daily routine to new and exhilarating heights.

Picture stepping into your shower and instantly being enveloped by the playful and captivating fragrance of Fruit Loops. As you lather up, this invigorating shower gel releases a delightful blend of zesty citrus, sweet berry bliss, and a hint of tropical goodness. These cheerful and tantalising scents swirl around you, creating a sensory symphony that dances through the air, awakening your senses and uplifting your spirits.

With each use, this fruity shower gel transforms your ordinary shower into an extraordinary experience. The vibrant aroma of citrus, mixed with the delicious sweetness of ripe berries and the exotic touch of tropical fruits, fills your bathroom, turning it into a bright and cheerful haven. The refreshing fragrance lingers on your skin, leaving you feeling revitalised, energised, and ready to take on whatever the day has in store.

Indulge in the nostalgia of your favourite breakfast treat and let the playful scent of Fruit Loops lift your mood. Whether youâ€™re starting your day or in need of a mid-day pick-me-up, this shower gel is the perfect way to bring a bit of fun and joy to your routine. Experience the burst of fruity fun, and let the vibrant essence of Fruit Loops shower gel refresh and invigorate you, day after day!

Product_Title: Kellogg's Pop Tarts Shower Gel 500ml
Body_Html:
Start your day in the most deliciously delightful way with the mouth-watering aroma of everyoneâ€™s favourite toaster pastries! Now, you can indulge your senses in the sweet and iconic scents inspired by Kelloggâ€™s Pop-Tarts, brought to life in a unique and fun shower gel experience.

Imagine stepping into your shower and being enveloped by the irresistible scent of frosted strawberry, brown sugar cinnamon, or wild berry, each fragrance more enticing than the last. As you lather up, the playful bubbles release these delectable aromas, instantly transporting you to memories of warm, comforting breakfasts that start the day off right.

These nostalgic scents will wrap you in a cosy embrace, making your shower a joyful escape that brings a smile to your face. Whether youâ€™re a frosted strawberry fan, crave the sweet spice of brown sugar cinnamon, or enjoy the fruity zing of wild berry, thereâ€™s a scent to match your mood and rekindle fond memories.

Each shower will feel like a special treat, turning the everyday routine into a moment of indulgence and fun. Elevate your shower experience and delight your senses with the playful, sweet, and irresistible aromas of Kelloggâ€™s Pop-Tarts-inspired shower gel. Breakfast has never smelled so good!

Product_Title: The Moody Bi*ch Pink Handle Mug Sarcastic Cup
Body_Html:
Crafted with care, this novelty mug is ideal for both hot and cold beverages. Whether you're sipping on a hot cup of coffee, tea, or enjoying a refreshing cold drink, this mug has got you covered.

Please note, to ensure the design lasts, this mug is not dishwasher-safe. For longevity, we recommend washing by hand only.

Key Features:

  • Capacity: 11oz
  • Suitable for hot or cold beverages
  • You will receive 1 pink handled mug with a bold "Moody" design
  • Hand wash only; do not use in dishwasher

Perfect as a gift for yourself or the moody person in your life!

PLEASE ADD THE NAME IN THE BOX 'ORDER SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS' IN BASKET OR EMAIL/MESSAGE US :)Â 

Crafted with care, this 1oz mug is ideal for both hot and cold beverages. Whether you're sipping on a hot cup of coffee, tea, or enjoying a refreshing cold drink, this mug has got you covered.

Personalised Working Girl Mug:

  • Capacity: 11 oz, perfect for your favourite cosy drinks.
  • Design: Printed on both sides with Girl Boss text..
  • Material: High-quality ceramic, durable for everyday use.
  • Dishwasher safe

Tailor it to your style by selecting the hair colour that represents you or your gift recipient!

Please note that the photo displayed is a mock-up for visual reference.

This high-quality 11 oz mug features a vibrant design printed on both sides, ensuring it looks great from every angle. This durable mug will make a stylish and practical addition to your collection or a thoughtful gift for someone special.

Product_Title: Fruitea Peach Bath Bomb Crumble 250g
Body_Html:
This uplifting, fruity, and delicious Peach bath bomb crumble is the perfect way to bring a touch of joy to your bath time. Combining the sweet, mouth-watering notes of fresh peaches with all the fizz you love, this bath crumble will freshen up your bathing experience and leave you feeling revitalised. Simply scatter as much or as little as you like into your bathtub to create a nourishing and relaxing escape.
Features:
  • Sweet Peach Scent: Immerse yourself in the delightful aroma of juicy peaches. This bath bomb crumble captures the essence of ripe, sun-kissed peaches, infusing your bath with a scent thatâ€™s both uplifting and refreshing. The sweet and fruity fragrance lingers on your skin, ensuring you feel fresh and fragrant throughout the day.
  • Customisable Experience: Whether you prefer a gentle hint of fizz or a bath filled with bubbles, this bath crumble allows you to customise your experience. Sprinkle a small amount for a subtle, relaxing soak or pour in a generous handful for a more luxurious and indulgent bath. The choice is yours, making each bath as unique as you are.
  • Nourishing Aloe Vera Extracts: Enriched with the soothing and hydrating properties of Aloe Vera, this bath crumble not only adds fun to your bath but also cares for your skin. Aloe Vera is known for its gentle cleansing and moisturising benefits, helping to leave your skin feeling soft, smooth, and nourished. Itâ€™s perfect for maintaining healthy, hydrated skin, especially after a long day.
  • Fizz and Fun: Watch as the bath crumble fizzes and dissolves in your bathwater, releasing its enchanting fragrance and creating a playful, effervescent experience. The fizzing action adds an element of fun to your bath, turning an ordinary routine into a delightful and relaxing ritual.
How to Use:
  1. Fill your bathtub with warm water, making sure itâ€™s at a comfortable temperature.
  2. Take a handful of the Peach bath bomb crumble and sprinkle it into the water. You can add as much or as little as you like, depending on how strong you want the scent and fizz to be.
  3. As the crumble fizzes and dissolves, step into the bath and let the sweet peach fragrance envelop you. Relax and enjoy the soothing, nourishing experience.
  4. After soaking, rinse off and pat your skin dry, enjoying the lingering scent of peaches and the soft, smooth feel of your skin.
Why Youâ€™ll Love It:
This Peach bath bomb crumble is the perfect addition to any bath time routine, offering a delightful and uplifting way to unwind. Its sweet peach scent and fizzing action provide a fun and enjoyable experience, while the added Aloe Vera ensures your skin is left feeling soft and moisturised. Ideal for a relaxing soak after a long day or for turning a simple bath into a special treat, this bath crumble is sure to become a favourite. Indulge in the fruity freshness of peaches and give yourself the pampering you deserve with this delightful bath bomb crumble.

Product_Title: Tony Moly x Minions Peach Sugar Body Scrub
Body_Html:
Introducing the Tony Moly Minions Peach Sugar Body Scrub, a delightful and nourishing skincare treat that will leave your skin feeling soft, smooth, and radiantly refreshed. Packaged in a generous 300ml size, this body scrub combines the playful charm of Minions with the luxurious experience of a premium body treatment.

Product Features:

  • Gentle Exfoliation: This body scrub features fine sugar particles, which act as a gentle, non-drying exfoliant. These sugar granules effectively polish the skin, sloughing away dead skin cells and impurities to reveal soft, smooth, and revitalised skin beneath.

  • Nourishing Peach Extract and Peach Water: Infused with antioxidant-rich Peach Extract and Peach Water, this body scrub provides more than just exfoliation. The vitamin-rich peach ingredients help to brighten and condition the skin, leaving it feeling hydrated and soothed. The natural moisturising properties of peach also work to enhance the skinâ€™s elasticity and suppleness, making it feel soft and nourished.

  • Delicious Peach Scent: Indulge your senses with the mouth-watering aroma of fresh peaches. The deliciously sweet scent lingers on your skin, creating a refreshing and uplifting experience that makes your skincare routine feel like a treat.

  • Playful Minions Design: Featuring the beloved Minions on the packaging, this body scrub adds a touch of fun to your bathroom shelf. Itâ€™s perfect for fans of all ages who enjoy a bit of whimsy and joy in their daily routine.

  • Hydrating and Moisturising: Beyond exfoliation, the Peach Extract and Peach Water work together to hydrate and moisturise the skin. This dual-action helps to lock in moisture, ensuring that your skin feels soft, smooth, and deeply nourished after every use.

How to Use:

  1. Begin by applying a generous amount of the Tony Moly Minions Peach Sugar Body Scrub onto wet skin.

  2. Gently scrub your body in a massaging motion, focusing on areas where you need extra exfoliation, such as elbows, knees, and feet. The sugar granules will work to buff away dead skin cells, while the peach ingredients nourish and moisturise.

  3. Once youâ€™ve thoroughly massaged the scrub into your skin, rinse off with lukewarm water, washing away the sugar and impurities, and leaving behind soft, radiant skin.

  4. For best results, use the body scrub 2-3 times a week, or as needed, to maintain smooth and healthy-looking skin.

Why You'll Love It:

The Tony Moly Minions Peach Sugar Body Scrub is more than just a skincare product â€“ itâ€™s an indulgent experience that combines effective exfoliation with nourishing hydration. Perfect for all skin types, this scrub will leave your skin feeling pampered, soft, and smelling irresistibly like fresh peaches. Whether youâ€™re starting your day or winding down in the evening, this body scrub is the perfect way to add a little luxury and fun to your shower routine. Product_Title: White & Pink Smiley Memory Foam Slippers
Body_Html:
Designed to bring a touch of joy to your daily routine, these slippers combine cheerful aesthetics with exceptional comfort, making them a must-have addition to your loungewear collection.

Features:

  • Charming Design: These slippers feature a delightful design with a soft white base adorned with a playful pink smiley face, adding a cheerful and fun vibe to your mornings and evenings. The charming smiley faces are sure to bring a smile to your face, making every step you take a little bit brighter.

  • Memory Foam Comfort: Step into unparalleled comfort with the memory foam cushioned insoles that mould to the shape of your feet, providing customised support and cushioning with every step. The plush memory foam ensures that your feet are cradled in softness, reducing fatigue and making these slippers perfect for all-day wear around the house.

  • Closed Front Design: The closed front design offers full coverage, keeping your feet snug and warm, ideal for cooler days and nights. The secure fit also prevents slipping, providing stability and safety as you move about your home.

  • Slip-On Convenience: Designed for ease and convenience, these slippers are easy to slip on and off, making them perfect for quick trips around the house or for relaxing after a long day. No need to fuss with laces or straps â€“ simply slide your feet in and enjoy.

  • Durable Outsole: The sturdy yet flexible outsole ensures durability and grip, making these slippers suitable for light outdoor use, such as stepping out to the garden or fetching the post. The non-slip design provides added safety on a variety of surfaces, so you can move confidently from room to room.

  • Soft and Breathable Materials: Crafted from soft, breathable materials, these slippers keep your feet cosy without causing overheating. The plush lining feels luxurious against the skin, providing an extra layer of warmth and comfort.

Why You'll Love Them:

These smiley memory foam slippers are the perfect blend of style, comfort, and functionality. Whether youâ€™re enjoying a relaxing weekend at home, getting ready for bed, or unwinding after a busy day, these slippers are designed to provide the ultimate in comfort and cheer. Their charming design and exceptional comfort make them a delightful gift for yourself or a loved one.

Slip into a pair today and experience the perfect balance of softness, support, and a touch of whimsy â€“ because even your feet deserve to smile!

Product_Title: Kellogg's Fruit Loops Shower Gel 500ml
Body_Html:
Kickstart your day with a burst of fruity fun! Immerse yourself in the vibrant and energising essence of everyoneâ€™s favourite breakfast cereal, now captured in a refreshing shower gel that will elevate your daily routine to new and exhilarating heights.

Picture stepping into your shower and instantly being enveloped by the playful and captivating fragrance of Fruit Loops. As you lather up, this invigorating shower gel releases a delightful blend of zesty citrus, sweet berry bliss, and a hint of tropical goodness. These cheerful and tantalising scents swirl around you, creating a sensory symphony that dances through the air, awakening your senses and uplifting your spirits.

With each use, this fruity shower gel transforms your ordinary shower into an extraordinary experience. The vibrant aroma of citrus, mixed with the delicious sweetness of ripe berries and the exotic touch of tropical fruits, fills your bathroom, turning it into a bright and cheerful haven. The refreshing fragrance lingers on your skin, leaving you feeling revitalised, energised, and ready to take on whatever the day has in store.

Indulge in the nostalgia of your favourite breakfast treat and let the playful scent of Fruit Loops lift your mood. Whether youâ€™re starting your day or in need of a mid-day pick-me-up, this shower gel is the perfect way to bring a bit of fun and joy to your routine. Experience the burst of fruity fun, and let the vibrant essence of Fruit Loops shower gel refresh and invigorate you, day after day!

Product_Title: Kellogg's Pop Tarts Shower Gel 500ml
Body_Html:
Start your day in the most deliciously delightful way with the mouth-watering aroma of everyoneâ€™s favourite toaster pastries! Now, you can indulge your senses in the sweet and iconic scents inspired by Kelloggâ€™s Pop-Tarts, brought to life in a unique and fun shower gel experience.

Imagine stepping into your shower and being enveloped by the irresistible scent of frosted strawberry, brown sugar cinnamon, or wild berry, each fragrance more enticing than the last. As you lather up, the playful bubbles release these delectable aromas, instantly transporting you to memories of warm, comforting breakfasts that start the day off right.

These nostalgic scents will wrap you in a cosy embrace, making your shower a joyful escape that brings a smile to your face. Whether youâ€™re a frosted strawberry fan, crave the sweet spice of brown sugar cinnamon, or enjoy the fruity zing of wild berry, thereâ€™s a scent to match your mood and rekindle fond memories.

Each shower will feel like a special treat, turning the everyday routine into a moment of indulgence and fun. Elevate your shower experience and delight your senses with the playful, sweet, and irresistible aromas of Kelloggâ€™s Pop-Tarts-inspired shower gel. Breakfast has never smelled so good!
